The Master degree program in Industrial Automation Engineering provides high level education to graduate students with a bachelor in Electrical Engineering or scientific disciplines. The syllabus comprises topics in the following areas: Electrical Engineering, Automation, Economics and Management. Lectures are integrated by lab activities, seminars and tutorials, delivered by industry leaders and visiting professors from all over the world.
